Question: Partnerships to develop resilience, international
Help Text: Cooperation with international agencies or actors, existing or in the process of creation. Ex.: international NGOs, development banks, cooperation/development agencies, etc.

Question: Partnerships to develop resilience, supra-local
Help Text: Cooperation with national or regional level government bodies, existing or in the process of creation. Ex.: civil defence, ministries, etc.

Question: Partnerships to develop resilience, local
Help Text: Cooperation with private sector or civil society in the local level, existing or in the process of creation. Ex.: public-private partnerships, local NGOs, etc.
